item.title: Server Standards
item.description: How to set up a Server Install in Terminal npm init creates package.json npm i express creates package-lock.json and node_modules folder where express folder can be found package.json now includes express as dependencies *Create .gitignore and add /node_modules npm i @babel/core @babel/node @babel/preset-env –save-dev babeljs.io adds babel as devDependencies touch babel.config.json copy-paste json code: {“presets”: ["@babel/preset-env"]} Now I can use babel by enabling presets npm i nodemon –save-dev A package that watches the files and restarts when a change has been made so I won’t have to “npm run dev” every time Update “scripts: {}” in package.
